text: All applications, filings, and reports required under this chapter shall be treated as public documents, except those which are trade secrets or privileged or confidential quality assurance, commercial, and financial information, other than any annual financial statement that may be required under § 31-3408.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 35-4525.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-235, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-3401.

DC CODE § 31-3425

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Filings and reports as public documents.
